Load the necessary packages:
```{r}
library(RSocrata)
library(tidyverse)
```

Load the crashes data: 
```{r}
crashes <- read.socrata("https://data.cityofchicago.org/resource/85ca-t3if.csv")

# as a backup:
crashes < read_csv("data/chicago_crashes.csv")
```
